name: WF106 - Schema Auto-Builder
description: Receives JSON schema blueprints and auto-deploys SQL to Supabase

parameters.responseBody: ={{ { "success": true, "version": $('Generate SQL').item.json.version, "description": $('Generate SQL').item.json.description, "tables_created": $('Generate SQL').item.json.table_count, "table_names": $('Generate SQL').item.json.table_names, "checksum": $('Generate SQL').item.json.checksum, "timestamp": $('Generate SQL').item.json.timestamp } }}
